rooms.description: A welcoming open space with a Vastu-compliant direction facing east to invite positive energy. Includes foyer and display shelves.

Spacious living area with Mediterranean aesthetics featuring arches and terracotta tiles. Fitted with modern luxury furnishings; large windows for natural light from the south, aligning with Vastu guidelines.
Adjacent to the living room, with a dining table that can comfortably seat 8. Features Mediterranean design elements and integrated lighting fixtures.
Modern kitchen layout designed for efficiency. Vastu guidelines recommend east facing windows; includes modern appliances and a breakfast bar.
Small bathroom facility for guests with minimal fixtures and a design that supports privacy and ease of maintenance.
Dedicated space on the ground floor for servants. Includes living area, small kitchenette, and attached toilet facilities; designed to ensure privacy and functionality.

openings.description: Vastu-aligned entrance from the east side of the building with a covered walkway for added shelter.
Direct access to the two-car garage, ensuring efficient vehicular movement and minimal traffic inside the house.

rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with an en-suite bathroom. Features Mediterranean style elements such as stucco walls and ceiling beams; Vastu principles suggest placement in the south-west corner for stability.
Additional bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, decorated in Mediterranean aesthetics with natural light through north-facing windows.
Open space adjoining the master suite offering views of landscaped surroundings; designed to promote relaxation while adhering to Vastu guidelines for open spaces.

openings.description: Winding staircase connecting ground and first floors, with well-lit treads following safety regulations and Vastu recommendations.
Openings designed to facilitate proper ventilation and natural light in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Space for laundry and storage. Designed with efficient layout to facilitate ease of use, keeping Vastu guidelines in mind.
Enhanced living space for servants including a small kitchenette and personal bathroom; designed to promote privacy while ensuring accessibility.
Corridor providing access between servant quarters and utility areas.

openings.description: Designated entry for maintenance personnel with secure locking features; ensures minimal intrusion into living spaces while adhering to safety norms.
Additional openings to promote ventilation and meet Vastu guidelines on natural light and airflow.
